rules_text:
Whenever an opponent casts their first noncreature spell during each of their turns, draw a card unless that player pays {X}, where X is Feyrouse, Beacon of Defiance’s power.
Whenever you expend 5, put a +1/+1 counter on Feyrouse. [i](You expend 5 as you spend your fifth total mana to cast spells during a turn.)[/i]
Whenever you expend 8, create a True Conviction token. [i](It’s a {3}{W}{W}{W} enchantment with “Creatures you control have double strike and lifelink.”)[/i]
